kj8twg0qText:
Brintellix® significantly improved depressive
symptoms in elderly patients*1
kj8twg0sText: Change in HAM-D24 total score in elderly patients (≥65 years)1
kj8twg0uText:
*As measured by HAM-D; **p<0.01; ***p<0.001 vs. placebo.
From a randomised, double-blind, placebo-controlled, duloxetine-referenced, fixed-dose study comparing the efficacy and safety of Brintellix® in elderly patients
(≥65 years) with MDD. Estimated Hamilton Rating Scale for Depression (24 items) HAM-D24 total score from baseline to Week 8. Duloxetine was included as an active
reference for study validation, not for comparison of effect size. N numbers relate to the intention to treat (ITT) population.
†Brintellix® does not exhibit many of the side effects typical of SSRIs and SNRIs including sexual dysfunction and weight gain.2-5 Side effects associated with Brintellix®
were compared with those of the SSRIs escitalopram and paroxetine and with those of the SNRI venlafaxine. For the 20 mg/day dose, an increase in treatment-emergent
sexual dysfunction was seen compared to placebo. Please refer to the full Summary of Product Characteristics or Prescribing Information for further information on safety
and tolerability; LOCF, last observation carried forward.
kj8twg0vText: Brintellix® 5 mg (n=155) Duloxetine 60 mg (n=148) (active reference)
kj8twg0yText: HAM-D24 mean change from baseline
Brintellix_490fca9331: 1. Katona C at al. Int Clin Pyschopharmacol 2012;27:215-223.
Brintellix_49e25c30fd: 2. Brintellix® Summary of Product Characteristics. 2021.
Brintellix_491ae0e8f3: 3. Cipralex® Summary of Product Characteristics. 2020.
Brintellix_4966879b99: 4. Effexor® Summary of Product Characteristics. 2020.
Brintellix_49589bfe78: 5. Seroxat® Summary of Product Characteristics. 2019.
